entities.name: vern dursley
entities.description: Uncle Vernon is the one who is changing his mind every twenty-four hours and packing/unpacking the car. He is also the one who attempted to hoist the case back into the boot and collapsed with pain.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the one who is being talked about by Uncle Vernon. He is also the one who has been watching his uncle change his mind every day.

entities.name: petunia
entities.description: Petunia is mentioned as one of the people in danger according to Harry's story.

entities.name: dudley
entities.description: Dudley is mentioned as one of the people in danger according to Harry's story. He also added his dumbbells to Uncle Vernon's case.

relationships.description: Uncle Vernon does not believe a word of Harry's story.
According to Harry, Uncle Vernon and Petunia are in danger from 'my lot'.
According to Harry, Uncle Vernon and Dudley are in danger from 'my lot'.
Harry has a story that he is telling to Uncle Vernon.
